item.title: AWS KMS+S3 File Storage
item.description: The AWS KMS+S3 pattern involves provisioning an S3 bucket which enforces encryption at rest together with KMS. In geodesic, we use this together with goofys and our s3fs wrapper scripts to mount the encrypted bucket to a local mount point inside the geodesic container. This is an awesome solution for securely storing file-based secrets (e.g. ssh master keys).
